fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Scuttle About: Visit a player. This visit has no effects. **Locked**: In addition, the player you visit will be framed as a role of your choosing for the night.
-Sting: Deal a Basic Attack to your target. **Locked**: In addition, your target will be permanently framed as a role of your choosing if they survive.
-Behind The Scenes Manipulation (**Locked**, 1-shot): **All** Investigative results done by ‘Good’ players tonight will be wrong. How this is executed is up to host discretion.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-Players killed by you will appear as **Stung by Skullbug**
-At the beginning of the game, you may choose a disguise role to appear as to Investigative roles.
-**Locked**: All Beasts may now choose disguise roles.
-**Unlock Condition**: If you are targeted by an Investigative role, or if your action is seen by an Investigative role, Unlock.
